title: RIOT FIX YOUR SHIT WTF IS GOING ON???
body:
I am playing a f@cking ranked game for my promos and suddenly I CANT F@CKING MOVE MY F@CKING CHAMPION!!!! Like WTF riot, i gave up 1st blood and then we lost the game bc it happened 8 F@CKING TIMES! No it was not lag, fps drop or smth like that i could see my teammates playing normaly BUT I COULDNT F@CKING MOVE! FIX YOUR F@CKING SHIT RIOT!!!!!!!

IM SO F@CKING MAD!

replies.body:
I double-checked and I wasn't able to find any record of service issues that could affect your connection to our game servers. This was most likely caused by some really bad *Packet Loss* or *extreme packet buffering*. If you're still seeing these issues, I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't the result of incompatible network settings on your local side.

Please let me know if you further encounter these symptoms after working through that guide.

I had the same for 3 games in row two of which i pulled wins outta my ass by commanding my team and bullshitted the hell outta macro i.e ryze backdoor nexus a bit feint baRON then port us to nexus Lul. 

But only fix after checking all sources(breakage in wires, packet loss and monitored internet traffic using wireshark to check potential malicious pings or Ddos, big wig IT method unplugged and plugged back in on comp and router, and fixed client from troubleshoot and reinstalled game.
